mapper.sql: FUNCTION_ID, FUNCTION_CODE, FUNCTION_TITLE, FUNCTION_DESC, ID_FULL_PATH, TITLE_FULL_PATH, IS_LAST_LEVEL, PARENT_APPLICATION_ID, STATUS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME,FUNCTION_TYPE ,ORG_ID ,IS_DELETE,FUNCTION_PATH
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_FUNCTION_MANAGE.nextval AS functionId FROM dual
insert into function_manage (FUNCTION_ID, FUNCTION_CODE, FUNCTION_TITLE, FUNCTION_DESC, ID_FULL_PATH, TITLE_FULL_PATH, IS_LAST_LEVEL, PARENT_APPLICATION_ID, STATUS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME) values (#{functionId}, #{functionCode}, #{functionTitle}, #{functionDesc}, #{idFullPath}, #{titleFullPath}, #{isLastLevel}, #{parentApplicationId}, #{status}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedTime})

SELECT SEQ_FUNCTION_MANAGE.nextval AS functionId FROM dual

update function_manage set IS_DELETE = 1 where FUNCTION_ID in
#{all}

update function_manage
FUNCTION_CODE = #{functionCode},
FUNCTION_TITLE = #{functionTitle},
FUNCTION_DESC = #{functionDesc},
ID_FULL_PATH = #{idFullPath},
TITLE_FULL_PATH = #{titleFullPath},
IS_LAST_LEVEL = #{isLastLevel},
PARENT_APPLICATION_ID = #{parentApplicationId},
STATUS = #{status},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy},
CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime},
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy},
UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime},
ORG_ID = #{orgId},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete},
FUNCTION_PATH = #{functionPath},
where FUNCTION_ID = #{functionId}

update function_manage set FUNCTION_CODE = #{functionCode}, FUNCTION_TITLE = #{functionTitle}, FUNCTION_DESC = #{functionDesc}, ID_FULL_PATH = #{idFullPath}, TITLE_FULL_PATH = #{titleFullPath}, IS_LAST_LEVEL = #{isLastLevel}, PARENT_APPLICATION_ID = #{parentApplicationId}, STATUS = #{status}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy}, CREATED_TIME = #{createdTime}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy}, UPDATED_TIME = #{updatedTime} where FUNCTION_ID = #{functionId}
mapper.select: select f.* from function_manage f where 1=1 and f.IS_DELETE = 0 and f.FUNCTION_ID=#{functionId}

select * from function_manage f LEFT JOIN acct_oper_priv_rela ao ON ao.FUNCTION_ID = f.function_id LEFT JOIN role_info ri ON ri.ROLE_ID = ao.ROLE_ID where 1=1 and ri.STATUS=1 and ri.IS_DELETE=0 and ao.FUNCTION_ID is not null
AND f.FUNCTION_ID = #{functionId}
